title: I'm going to sleep well tonight.
body:
Was just trying to play a normal game. Went JG. Few mins in our mid died to a gank, and a min later he died a second and third time to the same JG sitting in his bush who he took the bait of. He then went and took it out and flamed me, then decided to go ahead and "run down mid" to feed the leblanc and jax around 10-12 kills. He completely ruined this game for everyone in it. He constantly bragged about how he would not get punished because the system doesn't work the way that myself and the top laner thought it did. He later revealed to us in the post game lobby that the bot lane was in a trio with him and they honored him so that he would not get a punishment. He then started to brag about it in the post game chat. Then this happened 5 mins after I sent the report in.

Thank you riot.

replies.body:
Nice. Hopefully the punishment is really towards this mid laner, instead of the person that you reported 2 years ago.

What's funnier is that the mid lane feeder is literally a **Yasuo player**, and the community still wonders why we all still chooses to ban him no matter what...

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O2AlxEai,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-08T04:34:14.697+0000)
>
> Nice. Hopefully the punishment is really towards this mid laner, instead of the person that you reported 2 years ago.
> 
> What's funnier is that the mid lane feeder is literally a **Yasuo player**, and the community still wonders why we all still chooses to ban him no matter what...

I mean, I feel bad for the 10% of the Yasuo community thats made up of knowledgeable non apes. But for the most part yah I agree xD
I believe the answer is that he is easy to feed on,so is riven once you grasp that she is easy to learn.

wouldve loved to see his face when he got banned.

https://i.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/027/475/Screen_Shot_2018-10-25_at_11.02.15_AM.png
Yeaahh... Getting honored doesn't keep you from getting banned lmfao XD

For his sake, I hope he was a kid.

No grown ass adult should be acting that way.

> [{quoted}](name=Beacon Academy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O2AlxEai,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-04-08T08:51:08.063+0000)
>
> For his sake, I hope he was a kid.
> 
> No grown ass adult should be acting that way.

should
Just goes to show, the system works and it does not matter how you try to get around it.

Ahaha, I don't know if this classifies as him trying to get around it.

He only THOUGHT he got around it.

> [{quoted}](name=Silly Neeko,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O2AlxEai,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-04-08T04:44:37.644+0000)
>
> Just goes to show, the system works and it does not matter how you try to get around it.

it could work better, you can actually "get around it" easily since it's a automated system 
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

That person didn't. It also is easy to report via support ticket and it helps get rid of those "safety measures" people do to avoid getting punished.

But yes, the system could work better.... but it still works and not in a way that many innocent people are punished too.

> [{quoted}](name=Silly Neeko,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O2AlxEai,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2019-04-08T08:13:57.728+0000)
>
> That person didn't. It also is easy to report via support ticket and it helps get rid of those "safety measures" people do to avoid getting punished.
> 
> But yes, the system could work better.... but it still works and not in a way that many innocent people are punished too.

that person obviously didn't get around it...
Exactly the point.....

Did he say he was a streamer?

I want to see that clip.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O2AlxEai,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-04-08T10:18:57.130+0000)
>
> Did he say he was a streamer?
> 
> I want to see that clip.

Yeah, he is one. "Alterednemesis"
Had someone tell me to kill myself 3 days ago and hes still playing games. Yet I get instant 2 week ban for calling someone a phag

Looks like your typical Yasuo player to me, nothing special here : D

I had a Shyvana go 2 - 34 yesterday after not getting the lane she wanted, no instant feedback

Yeah that's cool, but MOST IMPORTANTLY why don't you have boots yet? And why are you going for more atk speed? It's 30 minutes in for crying out loud!!!!!

Joking well done, I got one yesterday, feels good man.
he  deserve to get banned.
Yasuo player btw

How long did you stay in the lobby? There is a Kayle in your conversation on the left and a Kayle in the lobby.
Either it is not the punishment for the snipped you show us - or you waited 10+ minutes in the lobby because the IFS is not THAT quick.
If so: Wow.
His fk up was he talked. Otherwise itd just been a "bad game"

> [{quoted}](name=AnotherFeeder,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O2AlxEai,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-04-08T06:07:58.373+0000)
>
> His fk up was he talked. Otherwise itd just been a "bad game"

My guess is it was not a ban for int feeding.

>He later revealed to us in the post game lobby that the bot lane was in a trio with him and they honored him so that he would not get a punishment.

Mmm, the sooner people learn the Honour and Report systems are separate, the better for everyone.

Honours doesn't take away or counter valid reports.

>He later revealed to us in the post game lobby that the bot lane was in a trio with him and they honored him so that he would not get a punishment. 

yeah... that's not how honors work...

Imagine his face. 
His poor face. 
The horror.
Wow this actually made my day, thank you.

Lol like how you relish that someone else was banned that ruined your game. It is also funny how you do not even look at yourself and take some of the blame. Like your 10% kp that you had, your no boots 28mins into the game, and the terrible build against their comp. But keep relishing in your own self gratification because if you were on my team i would have reported you for afking in the jungle all game. Before you come to the forums and gloat look at your own game play, because maybe just maybe you are part of the problem too.
Meanwhile I had to argue with someone who thought {{champion:122}} and {{champion:11}}  took a lot of IQ to play.
